title: Need some tips playing tough champion Kindred
body: fairly certain this is in the wrong place but it seems the most appropriate, please direct me to the proper place to put this.

replies.body: No worries bud! You'll might be able to find some fellow Summoner's who main Kindred over in the [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)board, but twitch recently added a new feature where you can browse League streamers by what champion they are playing! I use that myself as a way to check out how people play certain champions I'm picking up for the first time ^_^!
